Deprecated API

Contents

  • Deprecated Fields
  • Deprecated Methods
  • Deprecated Fields 
    Field and Description
    sx.blah.discord.json.requests.MessageRequest.mentions
  • Deprecated Methods 
    Method and Description
    sx.blah.discord.handle.obj.IGuild.banUser(String)
    Use IGuild.banUser(IUser)
    sx.blah.discord.handle.obj.IGuild.banUser(String, int)
    Use IGuild.banUser(IUser, int)
    sx.blah.discord.api.IDiscordClient.changeAccountInfo(Optional<String>, Optional<String>, Optional<String>, Optional<Image>)
    Use the split methods instead: IDiscordClient.changeUsername(String), IDiscordClient.changeEmail(String), IDiscordClient.changePassword(String), IDiscordClient.changeAvatar(Image).
    sx.blah.discord.api.IDiscordClient.createGuild(String, String, Optional<Image>)
    Use IDiscordClient.createGuild(String, IRegion, Optional)
    sx.blah.discord.handle.obj.IGuild.deleteOrLeaveGuild()
    See IGuild.deleteGuild() and IGuild.leaveGuild().
    sx.blah.discord.handle.obj.IRole.edit(Optional<Color>, Optional<Boolean>, Optional<String>, Optional<EnumSet<Permissions>>)
    See IRole.changeColor(Color), IRole.changeHoist(boolean), IRole.changeName(String), IRole.changePermissions(EnumSet)
    sx.blah.discord.handle.obj.IVoiceChannel.edit(Optional<String>, Optional<Integer>)
    Use IChannel.changeName(String) or IChannel.changePosition(int)
    sx.blah.discord.handle.obj.IChannel.edit(Optional<String>, Optional<Integer>, Optional<String>)
    See IChannel.changeName(String), IChannel.changePosition(int), IChannel.changeTopic(String)
    sx.blah.discord.handle.obj.IGuild.edit(Optional<String>, Optional<String>, Optional<Image>, Optional<String>, Optional<Integer>)
    See IGuild.changeName(String), IGuild.changeRegion(IRegion), IGuild.changeIcon(Optional), IGuild.changeAFKChannel(Optional), IGuild.changeAFKTimeout(int)
    sx.blah.discord.handle.obj.IGuild.editUserRoles(String, String[])
    Use IGuild.editUserRoles(IUser, IRole[])
    sx.blah.discord.api.internal.DiscordUtils.escapeString(String)
    No longer required for discord to handle special characters
    sx.blah.discord.handle.obj.Permissions.getAllPermissionsForNumber(int)
    See Permissions.getAllowedPermissionsForNumber(int) or Permissions.getDeniedPermissionsForNumber(int).
    sx.blah.discord.api.IDiscordClient.getRegionForID(String)
    Use IDiscordClient.getRegionByID(String)
    sx.blah.discord.handle.obj.IGuild.getRoleForID(String)
    Use IGuild.getRoleByID(String)
    sx.blah.discord.handle.obj.IUser.getRolesForGuild(String)
    Use IUser.getRolesForGuild(IGuild)
    sx.blah.discord.handle.obj.IGuild.getVoiceChannelForID(String)
    Use IGuild.getVoiceChannelByID(String)
    sx.blah.discord.handle.obj.IGuild.kickUser(String)
    Use IGuild.kickUser(IUser)
    sx.blah.discord.handle.obj.IChannel.overrideRolePermissions(String, EnumSet<Permissions>, EnumSet<Permissions>)
    Use IChannel.overrideRolePermissions(IRole, EnumSet, EnumSet)
    sx.blah.discord.handle.obj.IChannel.overrideUserPermissions(String, EnumSet<Permissions>, EnumSet<Permissions>)
    Use IChannel.overrideUserPermissions(IUser, EnumSet, EnumSet)
    sx.blah.discord.handle.obj.IChannel.removePermissionsOverride(String)
    Use either IChannel.removePermissionsOverride(IUser) or IChannel.removePermissionsOverride(IRole)
    sx.blah.discord.handle.obj.IGuild.transferOwnership(String)
    Use IGuild.transferOwnership(IUser)
